name: Ready
headline: Collaborative platform for optimizing regulated utilities such asâ¦
description: Ready builds software tools that help utility stakeholders collaborate, so that more families get better utility services at lower cost. Ready Digital Infrastructure empowers utilities to deliver next-generation digital services.

founders.name: Jase Wilson, Founder
founders.description: Serial founder passionate about building with talented engineers. Working to connect people to the digital services they need to make the most of lifeâ¦ remote work, telehealth, distance learning and more. Studied cities & networks @ MIT

founders.name: Mike Faloon, Founder
founders.description: Capital markets veteran with experience running hedge funds and large asset managers. Prior to start-up life, Mike oversaw an 80 person technology team with a $25mm annual tech budget as the COO at a $150 billion asset manager.

Government Efficiency Platform
# Get Ready to do more, with less.
Digital platform for utility regulators, funders and operators. Automate reporting & compliance, digitize collaboration, geospatial AI & more.
Get Demo
![Hero Graphic](https://ready.net/images/hero-graphic.svg)![Hero Graphic](https://ready.net/images/hero-graphic-tablet-size.svg)![Hero Graphic](https://ready.net/images/hero-graphic-mobile-size.svg)
## Trusted by Leading Governments, Consultants & Providers
![New York Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-ny.svg)![Louisiana Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-la.svg)![Ohio Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-oh.svg)![Hawaii Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-hi.svg)![California Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-ca.svg)![Indiana Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-in.svg)![Texas Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-tx.svg)![Arizona Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-az.svg)![Mississippi Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-ms.svg)
![Indelible Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-indelible.svg)![McKinsey Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-mckinsey.svg)![KPMG Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-kpmg.svg)![Quadra Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-quadra.svg)![Michael Baker Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-michael-baker.svg)![CPUC Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-cpuc.svg)![Nextera Logo](https://ready.net/industry/industry-6-nextera.svg)
![Utility Platform Graphic](https://ready.net/images/utility-platform-graphic.svg)
## A single platform for all of your stakeholders
![Icon for Government](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-museum.svg)
### Government
Grantors and public private partnerships.
![Icon for Providers](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-broadband.svg)
### Providers
Drive excellence in your broadband deployments. Know when and where to grow.
![Image](https://ready.net/images/six-pack-map.svg)
![Icon for Owners](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-briefcase.svg)
### Owners
Follow your portfolio's journey. Know when and where to deploy capex.
![Icon for Insurers](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-electricty.svg)
### Insurers
Automate reporting & compliance, leverage infrastructure, and more.
![Icon for Regulators](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-water.svg)
### Regulators
Manage your utility provider relationships, automate reporting & compliance, and more.
## What can you do with the Ready Platform?
![Icon for Manage grant programs](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-pts.svg)
### Manage grant programs
Seamlessly execute on your office's vision for broadband, energy & water grants. End-to-end grants platform. 
![Manage grant programs image](https://ready.net/images/four-pack-pts.svg)
![Icon for Test utility performance](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-ba.svg)
### Test utility performance
Get source-of-truth visibility into service quality, subscriber satisfaction, and more.
![Test utility performance image](https://ready.net/images/four-pack-grants.svg)
![Icon for Make compliance easy](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-cpc.svg)
### Make compliance easy
Automate reporting & compliance to keep your key stakeholders on the real work, not paperwork.
![Make compliance easy image](https://ready.net/images/four-pack-compliance.svg)
![Icon for Optimize your resources](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-rc.svg)
### Optimize your resources
Make the most of your federal and state allocations. Explore when and where to deploy funding.
![Optimize your resources image](https://ready.net/images/four-pack-optimizer.svg)
![SVG](https://ready.net/images/prequalification-figure.svg)
### Accelerate your BEAD Pre-Qualification Applications
Our platform equips State Broadband Offices with tools to streamline the Pre-Qualification process, enabling faster initiation of BEAD applications and reducing the time to connect families and businesses to high-quality bandwidth.
  * Adhere to federal standards, minimize errors and expedite funding readiness
  * Get seamless, hassle-free experience, encouraging participation and reducing onboarding challenges
  * Ensure transparency and accountability with a full audit trail that tracks every interaction, update, and decision, simplifying compliance and reporting


![SVG](https://ready.net/images/homepage-cpc-figure.svg)
### Run efficient, inclusive, data-driven Challenge Processes
Challenge Process Coordinator lets you run an efficient, centralized, audit-ready process that produces NTIA-compliant acceptable evidence by default.
  * Leverage empirical data and connect to your constituents
  * Securely automate your data handling
  * Set your evidentiary standard with customizable, NTIA-acceptable data collection
  * Enable your providers to easily submit evidence to a futuristic platform


![SVG](https://ready.net/images/homepage-arc-figure.svg)
### Automate your reporting and compliance with ARC™
Make sure your office and stakeholders are audit-ready.
  * Save hundreds of hours per year
  * Replace burdensome self-reporting with automated collection
  * Set your sub-grantees up to succeed
  * Optimize field audits: use predictive AI to surface anomalies


![SVG](https://ready.net/images/homepage-tkde-figure.svg)
### Keep Digital Equity in focus
Don’t let digital equity fall through the cracks.
  * Ensure your populations are fully covered
  * Empower your anchor institutions to participate
  * Bring services to people and places most in need


![ARC GAME RAD BOSS Graphic](https://ready.net/images/arc-graphic.svg)
## Get Ready for the new world
In an era of unprecedented social, environmental & economic change, you're required to do more, with less.Are you Ready?
### Not Ready
Manual, time-intensive, inbox-driven workflows.
  * Burdensome, error-prone analysis
  * Manual, labor-intensive collection processes


### With Ready:
Integrated software platform & solutions for future-ready governments, utilities & consultants.
  * Streamline workflows with predictive AI
  * Connect and protect stakeholders
  * Reduce waste, fraud & abuse


## Trusted by leading governments and operators
Ready delivers fully integrated platform solutions to streamline workflows, save time, and improve engagement. We're here to help government agencies and their trusted consultants do more, with less.
![Icon 1](https://ready.net/icons/stats-government.svg)
0
States Powered
![Icon 2](https://ready.net/icons/stats-face.svg)
0+
Utility Operators
![Icon 3](https://ready.net/icons/stats-money.svg)
$0Bn
in Grants Managed
## Everything you need for BEAD & beyond
Data-driven broadband offices leverage Ready State Platform to make the most of their resources.
![Icon for Automated Reporting & Compliance™](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-rc.svg)
### Automated Reporting & Compliance™
Protect your office and track your BEAD deployments in real-time. Empower your sub-grantees to deliver above & beyond.
Explore
![Icon for Challenge Process Coordinator](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-cpc.svg)
### Challenge Process Coordinator
Developed to comply with the complexity of NTIA requirements, while adapting to your vision and state requirements.
Explore
![Icon for Performance Test & Survey](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-pts.svg)
### Performance Test & Survey
Get the empirical, NTIA-compliant acceptable evidence you need for your BEAD challenge process.
Explore
![Icon for Full Lifecycle Grant Manager](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-provider.svg)
### Full Lifecycle Grant Manager
Make the most of your grant resources, from pre-application research, to applications, scoring, award & beyond.
Explore
![Icon for Broadband Audit](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-ba.svg)
### Broadband Audit
Free broadband audits for every state, county, and city. Discover unserved and underserved broadband areas at the state, city, county, and tribal community level.
Explore
![Icon for Turnkey Digital Equity](https://ready.net/icons/six-pack-optimizer.svg)
### Turnkey Digital Equity
Ensure your anchor institutions and covered populations get the services they deserve.
Explore
![Quote Icon](https://ready.net/icons/carousel-quote.svg)
ConnectLA is dedicated to transforming Louisiana's digital landscape, one connection at a time. The Ready.net team and the Ready Platform have been an invaluable partner in bridging the digital divide in our state with innovation and determination.
![Line Divider](https://ready.net/icons/carousel-line.svg)![Company Logo](https://storage.googleapis.com/ready-net-public-assets/connect_La_logo_quote_8ef655ddd4/connect_La_logo_quote_8ef655ddd4.svg)
**Thomas Tyler** Deputy Director, ConnectLA
![Previous](https://ready.net/icons/left-carousel-arrow.svg)![Next](https://ready.net/icons/right-carousel-arrow.svg)

generated_description:
**Ready: Bridging Digital Gaps in Utilities**

Ready, founded in 2020 and based in San Francisco, is making waves in the utilities sector with its collaborative software platform. The company's mission? To optimize regulated utilities so that every family can access better utility services at a more affordable rate. Initially rooted in the idea of fostering collaboration among utility stakeholders, Ready has evolved into a powerful tool for utility regulators, funders, and operators.

### **What They Do**

Ready specializes in harnessing digital infrastructure to empower utilities to deliver next-generation services. Their offerings include:

1. **Geospatial Tools**
   - **Ready GROW**: Designed to help utilities enhance their subscriber base through comprehensive geospatial reasoning.
   - **Challenge Process Coordinator**: Streamlining compliant processes for data collection and stakeholder engagement.

2. **Process Tools**
   - **Ready State Platform**: A software solution aimed at optimizing broadband funding programs like BEAD and CPF grants.
   - **Performance Test & Survey**: Collecting empirical data to ensure compliance with federal standards.

3. **Compliance Tools**
   - **Automated Reporting & Compliance™ (ARC)**: This tool protects utility offices and supports their sub-grantees, automating the complex reporting requirements that come with regulatory oversight.

### **Target Audience**

Ready's solutions cater to a diverse audience including government entities, broadband providers, utilities, and consultants. They streamline workflows to improve efficiency, reduce administrative burden, and foster better stakeholder engagement. 

### **Background and Achievements**

Part of Y Combinator’s Batch S20, Ready has rapidly grown to a team of 70 and is currently trusted by numerous governments and utility operators in the U.S. Their platform has been embraced in various states, showcasing their commitment to enhancing digital equity and addressing the broadband gap in underserved areas.

### **Key Features and Impact**

- **Empathetic Technology**: Ready aims to ensure every community is covered, helping local governments and utility providers to tailor their services effectively.
- **Streamlined Grant Management**: They offer an end-to-end grants platform, helping organizations manage federal and state funding efficiently.
- **Data-Driven Insights**: Their analytics tools provide a clear overview of utility performance, which empowers teams to make informed decisions.

### **In Conclusion**

Ready stands out for its blend of technology and empathy, focusing on the tangible results that affect everyday lives. Their innovative approach not only enhances service delivery but also positions them as critical players in closing the digital divide—all while being backed by the expertise of mentors like Michael Seibel. If you’re interested in how they can transform utility management, check out [Ready's website](https://ready.net) for more information. They’re not just getting ready for the future—they’re helping others get ready too.
